text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://jpfhir.jp/fhir/Common/ValueSet/JP_Department_SsMix2Digits_VS
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://jpfhir.jp/fhir/Common/ValueSet/JP_Department_SsMix3Digits_VS

name: JP_Department_SsMix_VS
title: JP Core Department SS-MIX ValueSet
publisher: FHIR Japanese implementation research working group in Japan Association of Medical Informatics (JAMI)

contact.name: FHIR Japanese implementation research working group in Japan Association of Medical Informatics (JAMI)
